nodes.text: The Ferrous Aurora Nebula was an area of dense, reddish gas located in the Thesme sector. During the Galactic Civil War, travel through the nebula was considered to be dangerous, due to a presence of Ni'lyahin Smugglers.
While originally being connected with the Yavin system, the nebula was placed within the Thesme sector by the Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion.
